title: Hybrid ADDIE-RAD-Based Local Culture Preservation and Multilingual Mathematics Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Multilingual learning environment integrating regional cultural elements (myths/legends) into math problem-solving, incorporating Pancasila values and English-native language (Moi) parallel learning features

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more strategies utilizing local cultural contexts to solve math problems
Learners can accurately translate and utilize over 50 math terms in a multilingual (English-native language) interface
Learners can creatively develop one math model reflecting local cultural elements through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
